name: Vulcanization
description:
A survival-builder game about an island with an *unstable* volcano at the center.

---HOW TO PLAY---

SURVIVE THE VOLCANO

If you survive the 3 rounds of the volcano eruption, you win!

But watch out! If the lava of the volcano touches the water, a dangerous acid rain will cover the island killing all the people. If this happens, you lose...

Each round the volcano generates 1 lava block that.

RAISE A TROPICAL VILLAGE

You can build structures to stop the lava advance:

- House (Cost: 50 Food) (Health: 50): Gives 1 People.

- Farm (Cost: 50 Food | 2 People) (Health: 100): Generates 10 Food every 5 seconds.

Each lava block has 100 points of health and needs to destroy the structure before moving to the next tile.

So you can build 2 Houses on the way and eliminate the lava block, for example.

RESOURCES

- Food

- People
